headline: AmEx closed 30 accounts potentially tied to Iran's government
summary: The accounts were only used for personal expenses, AmEx said in a regulatory filing on Friday.  The company said it had voluntarily reported the activity to the Treasury Department's Office of Foreign Assets Control.  Spokespeople for the Treasury did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.
